titleStmt.title: Epidiorthōsis or a modest enquiry into the nature and state of churches. In order to their through-reformation. By Thomas Boyer minister at Rempston in Nottinghamshire.
titleStmt.author: Boyer, Thomas, b. 1627 or 8.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R.W. for Nathaniel Ekins at the Gun in Pauls Church-yard, and for Stephen Lincoln in Leicester,

notesStmt.note: First word of title is in Greek characters.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "Febr. 1658"; the 9 in the imprint date has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
